Articles.Content:
Made My next move

Persist:http://www./download/2icc915rvjnqg8b/Battle_for_Bop_III.zip

Here you go. I had to drastically tone down the thread to stop the RP nonsense.

Yes, nobody wants a repeat of that. Strangely though if it's in challenges the mods don't give a flying **** *Mods everywhere!

Modification not moderators.

Realism War Game Well that didn't last long. See how I'm pressing against the box:P
The title of that gives me an idea for a battle mode where we only use historical replicas. lol
Why don't we turn Gentlemen's battle thread into it's own forum? I could set up the forum if anybody else's interested?
Because the last two tries lasted at most a few weeks.

Why don't we turn Gentlemen's battle thread into it's own forum? I could set up the forum if anybody else's interested?

What would be the point of that? It would just mean we lose a lot of traffic.
And this thread dies every time a replacement goes through it's life cycle(Explosions, planning, excitement, starting, issues, locked)

Just don't declare open war on a large organization. That's how our last few iterations got shut down.

Anyways, What should I make next. I will have quite a tight craft building time period soon.
Well while you guys do that I'll just be over here. This still needs a name, any suggestions?
The Solar Harvester. It should be the bane of every stellar body to ever be condensed into a fusion reactor.

I plane on expanding it, It's a small Colony ATM. Me and a friend are doing a shared persistance project to dot Kerbin with Colonies, Military Bases, Radar Stations, Space Centers, Research bases, Etc.
You should put in an experimental ABM base to defend against incoming missiles and debris. I tried some abm s with limited success in the past.
Can Somebody say modified Plooto?
We should do a community space station for the battle thread.
Or a Colonization effort? I wouldn't mind a Kerbin Kolonization project or atleast a Public one?

We should do a community space station for the battle thread.

Like they did for you tubers?

We should do a community space station for the battle thread.

That would be cool... maybe a stardock of sorts with a military ship from each person who works on it to showcase the varied fleets/ship designs on this thread?

Then we could put it on the front page, as a sort of way to introduce people to the thread.

The title of that gives me an idea for a battle mode where we only use historical replicas. lol

My Panthers will dance....

Here's a picture of the devastation they can cause:

In case you forgot....

I REALLY want a battle mode like that

I actually have a thread where I made something like that.
Pfft all I'd do is modify a Me-262 to carry rockets at that point astecaryman
That was the first tank I made. There is no experience behind its design. It was an easy target.

Battle update: Operation Marvelous Light

File has become corrupted and can not continue battle.

I concede this first battle to Mullican.
I still need to make a bloody tank, I still want a supertank with 8 layers of heavy armour. Muahahahahaha!
Maybe we could each make a different part of a community fleet, kind of like a showcase of what happens when various philosophies combine together.
I'll bring Temeraire.

I'll bring the destroyer.
